entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:50 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
